reviews.review:
Na samym początku przed zakupem Portala myślałem, że to będzie zwykła gra logiczna jednakże myliłem się. Podczas kwarantanny zakupiłem Portala i zdziwiłem się, ponieważ gra wciąga jak szalona. 
Lokacja gry czyli gigantyczna placówka badawcza jest przepełniona tajemnicami, niezwykłymi widokami oraz fabułą z ciekawym zwrotem akcji. 
Na niektórych poziomach trzeba było trochę dłużej pomyśleć co uważam za plus.
Gra mimo swoich lat nadal potrafi dostarczyć po takim czasie DUŻO zabawy.
Żeby nie popełniać tego samego błędu co ja polecam przed zagraniem w 2. część zagrać w 1. część Portala, aby rozgrywka była przyjemniejsza.
Z niecierpliwością czekam na Portala 3.
Pozdrawiam cieplutko
Very good game. I strongly recommend it. Although you will need patience and you will need the brains to beat the game. 9/10 puzzle game.
одна из лучших игр но коператив бесполезен одни дебилы попадаются
Топовая как и первая так и вторая

Поставил "Не рекомендую" лишь для того, чтобы выделиться.
На самом деле никаких претензий к этой игре.
Ушёл нюхать клей.
One of the best games I've ever played. Highly recommended.
This game is pog let me tell ya its just pog
So, How are you holding up? BECAUSE I'M A POTATO.
It's actually almost as good as the original, and even better in some cases (the second half of the game, to be precise). If you liked the first game, you'll love the second.

I'd recommend the game since it's so cheap right now and very easy to get on sale. The only problem is that a large portion of the game is spent just trying to find the next spot to portal to without really having much of a puzzle aspect more than just, find the correct spot. Still has fun and cool puzzles though
Best game para coops con tu wachx
God I love a good puzzle, Portal 2 delivers
You shoot the gun, You go through holes. What more can you need?
if you'r reading this, you have no reason to, this game is just a masterpiece and the fact that you are reading reviews to know if it's a good buy is blasphemous
Certamente entre os melhores de todos os tempos, Portal 2 aprofunda as mecanicas e a historia do primeiro em todos os sentidos.
i reelly liked this game would reccomend, cant wait for a third one
The humor is great and the puzzles are fun, very good game
good game bois lets get the next one out amirite haha
terminada la campaña por 2da vez y sigue siendo un juegazo como lo recordaba y el coop una maravilla 👍👍👍
Good game was fun weird story
its fun to play with friends
Great puzzle game and follow-up to Portal. I also recommend Portal Stories: Mel.
ive finished it way too many times both on pc and xbox so i have at least 4000 hours of experience on it and i can say that its way better than it looks
fun gaem definitely didnt look up every answer
amazing game with amazing grapgics and a good story line. would 100% recomend this game and it even works on old computers

이미 너무 유명한 게임이라 설명은 건너 뛰고

비추가 너무 많아서 균형을 맞추기 위해 추천박습니다.

Псевдо обзор:                             
Вообщем поначалу было сложно и в падлу играть и проходить все эти тупые испытания, но потом появился сюжет стало интересно и затянуло. Да сложно, но можно подумать и все решить так сказать. Игра в 2020 не мертва, есть так же интересный кооп. И много других плюшек. Концовка аху...ен..*ая. Рекомендую
genuis. as far as i am concerned this is the perfect game
I have completed the single player about 25 times. It's really good, a must play.
cara muito bom serio joggo com meu amigo geo e serio ajente ama o jogooooooooooo !!!!!!
Must buy for all gamers. Very much recommended.
it very much improved on the previous game, in terms of story and game play. there are tons of free mods that add plenty of extra stories
Love this game. Great for anyone into puzzles and awesome humor

Honestly one of my favourite games of all time and I doubt anything could top it. Everything from the game play to the voice acting is just perfect. I know this game has been out for many years and others will have written better worded reviews but I cannot recommend this game enough to anyone!
trés bon jeu lon avec beaucoup de diversité un mode coop et un editer de map complet
Бегаешь и хреначиш порталами тудв сюда
one of the best games out there.
